Html:
Hi,

I have been developed an application (localhost), but when the application have been uploaded on server, i have received this error:
Fatal error: Class 'PHPExcel_Reader_excel2007' not found in /path/to/the/class/PHPExcel/IOFactory.php on line 170

The app has been developed with Codeigniter v2.1.4 and PHPExcel 1.7.9

I hope you can help me.
Best regards.
